items.summary: In the backend, add initialization logic (or upgrade hook) that ensures users with the email identifiers 'daniel@periniprojetos.com.br' and 'danielperini.mc@viadutodasartes.org.br' are assigned the administrator role (e.g., 'coordenador_geral' or the highest-privilege role available in the system). This should run on canister upgrade so that their roles are updated even if they already exist in the userProfiles stable state.

Generate a migration.mo that upgrades existing userProfiles stable state, applying the administrator role to the two specified users ('daniel@periniprojetos.com.br' and 'danielperini.mc@viadutodasartes.org.br') while preserving all other user profile data unchanged.
